devdoc.author: Mircea Pasoi
devdoc.details: Key data is stored using KeyStore library. Inheriting ERC725 for the getters

addKey(bytes32,uint256,uint256).details: Add key data to the identity if key + purpose tuple doesn't already exist
addKey(bytes32,uint256,uint256).return: `true` if key was added, `false` if it already exists

addrToKey(address).details: Convert an Ethereum address (20 bytes) to an ERC725 key (32 bytes)

getKeysByPurpose(uint256).details: Find all the keys held by this identity for a given purpose
getKeysByPurpose(uint256).return: Array with key bytes for that purpose (empty if none)

keyHasPurpose(bytes32,uint256).details: Find if a key has is present and has the given purpose
keyHasPurpose(bytes32,uint256).return: Boolean indicating whether the key exists or not

numKeys().details: Number of keys managed by the contract

pause().details: called by a MANAGEMENT_KEY or the identity itself to pause, triggers stopped state

removeKey(bytes32).details: Remove key data from the identity
removeKey(bytes32).return: `true` if key was found and removed, `false` if it wasn't found

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: See {IERC165-supportsInterface}.     * Time complexity O(1), guaranteed to always use less than 30 000 gas.

unpause().details: called by a MANAGEMENT_KEY or the identity itself to unpause, returns to normal state
